bugReport.title: Report Bug
bugReport.titlePlaceholder: Ex: Button not working, page not loading, save error...
bugReport.descriptionPlaceholder:
1. What were you trying to do?
2. What happened instead?
3. Steps to reproduce:
   - Step 1
   - Step 2
   - Step 3
4. Expected behavior:
bugReport.severityMedium: Medium - Moderate issue (ex: feature not working)
bugReport.severityHigh: High - Important issue (ex: cannot save data)
bugReport.severityCritical: Critical - App not working (ex: page not loading)
bugReport.success: Bug reported successfully! Thank you for your feedback.
bugReport.error: Error sending report. Please try again.
bugReport.unexpectedError: Unexpected error. Please try again later.

pricing.faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
pricing.faq.a1: Yes, Rider Forge Pro is an annual subscription of only €3.99. You pay just once per year, which is only €0.33 per month!
pricing.faq.q2: Are my riders saved if I cancel?
pricing.faq.a2: Yes, all your riders remain saved. If you cancel, you can continue accessing existing riders but cannot create new ones (limit of 2 in Free).
pricing.faq.q3: What payment methods do you accept?
pricing.faq.a3: We accept all major credit and debit cards, including Visa, Mastercard, American Express, and other secure methods via Stripe.

tab.final.templates.festival.title: Festival
tab.final.templates.festival.content:
SCHEDULES:
• Setup: [time]
• Soundcheck: [time]
• Show: [time]

POWER:
• Electrical power requirements for equipment
• Generator backup if necessary

ACCESS:
• Backstage access time
• Loading area for equipment
• Parking for van/bus

SPECIFIC REQUIREMENTS:
• Specific PA configurations
• Console presets
• IEM configurations
• Backing tracks or playbacks

tab.final.templates.acustico.title: Acoustic Show
tab.final.templates.acustico.content:
SCHEDULES:
• Setup: [time]
• Soundcheck: [time]
• Show: [time]

REQUIREMENTS:
• Specific acoustic equipment
• Audio configurations for acoustic instruments
• Venue access

OBSERVATIONS:
• Acoustic instruments (guitar, piano, etc.)
• Microphone configurations
• Backing tracks if necessary

pro.features.title: Why choose Rider Forge Pro?
pro.features.subtitle: Discover how Rider Forge Pro can transform your music production
pro.errors.payment: Error processing payment. Please try again.
pro.faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
pro.faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about Rider Forge Pro
pro.faq.a1: Yes, Rider Forge Pro is an annual subscription of only €3.99. This means you pay only once per year, which is equivalent to only €0.33 per month!
pro.faq.q2: Are my riders saved if I cancel?
pro.faq.a2: Yes, all your riders remain saved. If you cancel, you can continue to access your existing riders, but you won't be able to create new riders (limit of 2 in Free version).
pro.faq.q3: What payment methods do you accept?
pro.faq.a3: We accept all major credit and debit cards, including Visa, Mastercard, American Express and other secure payment methods through Stripe.
pro.faq.q4: Can I cancel at any time?
pro.faq.a4: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time through the management portal. You will continue to have access to Pro features until the end of the billing period.
subscription.title: Subscription Management
subscription.description: Manage your Pro subscription and configure your payment preferences
subscription.portalDesc: Access the Stripe portal to change payment method, view invoices and more
subscription.cancelDesc: Cancel your Pro subscription. You will continue to have access until the end of the current period
subscription.cancelWarning: Are you sure you want to cancel your Pro subscription? You will continue to have access to all Pro features until the end of the current period.
subscription.portalRedirect: After cancellation, you will be redirected to the Stripe portal
subscription.reactivate: You can reactivate the subscription at any time
faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to the most common questions about Rider Forge
faq.contactTitle: Didn't find the answer you were looking for?
faq.contactDesc: Our team is here to help. Contact us and we'll respond within 24-48 hours.
faq.answers.a1: Rider Forge is a professional tool for creating technical riders. It allows musicians, sound technicians and producers to create detailed and professional technical riders easily and intuitively.
faq.answers.a2: A technical rider is a document that specifies all technical requirements for a musical performance, including sound equipment, lighting, stage requirements, and other technical specifications necessary for the event.
faq.questions.q3: Can I use Rider Forge for free?
faq.answers.a3: Yes! Rider Forge offers a free plan that allows you to create up to 2 riders with basic features. For advanced features like unlimited riders, Pro equipment library and version history, we recommend upgrading to the Pro plan.
faq.questions.q4: What are the differences between Free and Pro plans?
faq.answers.a4: The Free plan includes: up to 2 riders, basic equipment library, basic PDF export and 5MB storage. The Pro plan includes: unlimited riders, Pro equipment library, customizable PDF, version history and unlimited storage.
faq.questions.q5: How can I export my riders?
faq.answers.a5: You can export your riders in PDF format. In the Free plan, export is basic. In the Pro plan, you can completely customize the layout and design of the exported PDF.
faq.answers.a6: Yes, the security of your data is a priority. We use end-to-end encryption and follow best security practices. Your riders are stored securely and privately.
faq.answers.a7: Yes! You can share your riders through automatically generated links. These links allow others to view the rider without needing a Rider Forge account.
faq.answers.a8: Version history (available in Pro plan) automatically saves all changes made to your riders. You can view and restore previous versions at any time.
faq.answers.a9: Currently, Rider Forge does not support direct import of existing riders. However, you can create new riders based on templates or copy information from existing riders.
faq.questions.q10: How can I cancel my Pro subscription?
faq.answers.a10: You can cancel your Pro subscription at any time through the subscription management page. After cancellation, you will continue to have access to Pro features until the end of the current period.
faq.questions.q11: Does Rider Forge work on mobile devices?
faq.answers.a11: Yes! Rider Forge is a responsive web application that works on computers, tablets and smartphones. The interface automatically adapts to screen size.
faq.questions.q12: Do I need an account to use Rider Forge?
faq.answers.a12: You can create riders without an account, but to save and manage your riders, you'll need to create a free account. The account also allows you to sync your riders between devices.
faq.questions.q13: What types of equipment are included in the library?
faq.answers.a13: The library includes professional sound equipment such as consoles, microphones, monitors, PA systems, lighting equipment and much more. The Pro library includes more advanced and specialized equipment.
faq.answers.a14: Yes! You can add custom equipment that is not in the library. This equipment is saved in your account and can be reused in other riders.
faq.questions.q15: How can I get technical support?
faq.answers.a15: You can contact us through the bug report button in the application or send an email to our support. We respond to all questions within 24-48 hours.

legal.privacy.title: Privacy Policy
legal.privacy.section1.title: 1. Information We Collect
legal.privacy.section1.content: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, use our services, or contact us:
legal.privacy.section1.list1: Account information: Name, email, and profile information
legal.privacy.section1.list2: User content: Technical riders you create and save
legal.privacy.section1.list3: Usage information: How you use our application
legal.privacy.section1.list4: Technical information: Device type, browser, IP address
legal.privacy.section2.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
legal.privacy.section2.list3: Communicate with you about your account and services

legal.terms.section1.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
legal.terms.section1.content: By accessing and using Rider Forge, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Use. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, you should not use our services.
legal.terms.section2.title: 2. Service Description
legal.terms.section2.content: Rider Forge is an online platform that allows users to:

support.bug.description: Found an issue? Help us improve
support.contact.title: Contact Support
support.contact.description: Send us an email for personalized assistance
support.docs.title: Documentation
support.docs.description: Guides and tutorials to use Rider Forge
support.quickHelp.title: Quick Help
support.quickHelp.q1: How do I create my first rider?
support.quickHelp.a1: Click 'Create New Rider' on the home page and start filling in the basic information. The system will guide you through all necessary sections.
support.quickHelp.q2: How do I export a rider to PDF?
support.quickHelp.a2: In the rider editor, click the 'PDF' button in the top right corner. You can customize export options before generating the document.
support.quickHelp.a3: Yes! After exporting a rider, you'll receive a share link that you can send to other users. They can view the rider without needing an account.
support.quickHelp.q4: How does the Pro upgrade work?
support.quickHelp.a4: The Pro plan offers unlimited riders, premium equipment library, customizable PDF and version history. It costs only €3.99 per year.
support.contactInfo.title: Still need help?
support.contactInfo.description: Our support team is available to help with specific questions. We respond to all contacts within 24-48 hours.
